name: Where Did These Players Start? Trivia Quiz | Sports | 20 Questions

questions.text: Where did Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink start his career?
questions.explanation:
Telsar.

	During 2001 he played for Chelsea.

questions.text: Where did Nuno Gomes start his career?
questions.explanation:
Boavista.

	During 2001, Gomes played for Fiorentina.

questions.text: Where did Alessandro Del Piero start his career?
questions.explanation:
Padova.

	Del Piero scored 16 goals during 2001.

questions.text: Where did Fabio Cannavaro start his career?
questions.explanation:
Napoli.

	He signed with Inter during the summer of 2002.

questions.text: Where did Ronaldinho start his career?
questions.explanation:
Gremio.

	He scored a goal against England in the 2002 World Cup.

questions.text: Where did Ruud Van Nistelrooy start his career?
questions.explanation:
Den Bosch.

	In his first season with Manchester United (2001-02), Ruud scored 36 goals in 48 appearences.

questions.text: Where did Christian Ziege start his career?
questions.explanation:
Bayern Munich.

	During 2001, Ziege plays for Tottenham Hotspur.

questions.text: Where did Bixente Lizarazu start his career?
questions.explanation:
Bordeaux.

	Lizarazu played one season with Atheltic Bilbao.

questions.text: Where did Ciracio Sforza start his career?
questions.explanation:
Grasshopper.

	During 2001, Sforza played for Bayern Munich.

questions.text: Where did Jaap Stam start his career?
questions.explanation:
Zwolle.

	Stam used to play for Manchester United.

questions.text: Where did Marc Overmars start his career?
questions.explanation:
Go Ahead.

	One of my favorite players.

questions.text: Where did Mark Van Bommel start his career?
questions.explanation:
Fortuna Sittard.

	A big talent, the Dutchmen was linked with a move to Barcelona.

questions.text: Where did Martin Palermo start his career?
questions.explanation:
Estudiantes.

	Palermo missed 3 penalties in a match against Colombia during the 1999 Copa America.

questions.text: Where did Andy Cole start his career?
questions.explanation:
Arsenal.

	Cole moved to Blackburn from Man United during the 2001-02 season.

questions.text: Where did Eyal Berkovic start his career?
questions.explanation:
Maccabi Haifa.

	During 2001, Berkovic helped City make the Premier League.

questions.text: Where did Avi Nimni start his career?
questions.explanation:
Maccabi Tel Aviv.

	Nimni had spells with Atletico Madrid and Derby County.

questions.text: Where did Mark Bosnich start his career?
questions.explanation:
Manchester United.

	Bosnich is a GK.

questions.text: Where did Gabriel Batistua start his career?
questions.explanation:
Newell's Old Boys.

	Batistuta made his debut for Argentina against Brazil.

questions.text: Where did Rivaldo start his career?
questions.explanation:
Paulista.

	Riavldo signed with Paulista during the summer of 1989, then went to Santa Cruz after that.

questions.text: Where did Hernan Crespo start his career?
questions.explanation:
River Plate.

	Crespo's name has been linked with a move to Man United.
